title: Preformulation study of a Cuban pentavalent DPT-HB-Hib vaccine, Heberpenta®-L
author: Néstor S Expósito-Raya; Yayrí C Prieto-Correa; Mabel Izquierdo-López; Zoe Nuez-Lamothe; Soraya Piloto-Díaz; Yamila Martínez-Cuellar; Makis Torres-Toledo; Annette Pereira-Sanabria; Rubén López-Edghill; Jose L Marcelo-Sainz; Amarilys Rodriguez-Arrebato; María de los A Denis-Cruz; Yanet Alderete-Avalos; Anaelsi Chacon-Molina; Eduardo Martínez-Díaz
cleaned_text: 2020, Number 1 Biotecnol Apl 2020; 37 (1) Preformulation Kb. of combined vaccines is a very useful project for all the advantages that this type of vaccine provides. However, complexities in its execution due to their technological challenges make difficult its development. In this sense, the pentavalent vaccine (DPT-HB-Hib), branded as Heberpenta®, has technology were studied using different physical-chemical and biological tests.
